name: Yume Memory
description:
Get ready to exercise your brain and embark on an unforgettable journey with Yume Memory, the ultimate Match Two memory game!
Immerse yourself in a captivating gameplay experience as you uncover a dazzling array of colorful tiles. Your mission? Unleash your memory power and match pairs of identical tiles in the fastest time possible.

Match two cards with the same image together to receive two points. If the cards do not match lose one point.

Features

- Original Anime Style Chibi Art of 11 Characters from the Yume Creations Universe
- Chill with relaxing LoFi Background Music
- Highscore System
- Can be played only with a mouse
- 1920x1080 HD Resolution
- Endless Playmode
- Windows and Linux
- Achivements
